archimate:Requirement.name: PM.1.5.3g: g) supported by the means to securely store and destroy confidential printed information (e.g. access to lockable fireproof storage areas and cross-cut shredders).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
